display.title: Rhodium-Plated Palladium
description: Congratulations on making it this far!
Progressing into &&dLuV&&r will require more than &&aRhodium Plated Palladium&&r and &&9LuV Circuits&&r alone. You'll also need the &&3Assembly Line&&r.
The &&4resource costs&&r for components will also start to increase &&4significantly&&r as you work towards &&eFusion&&r.
If you haven't got automation for nearly everything, now (in &&1IV&&r) is a good time to do it. Take advantage of the power granted by &&2Gregicality Multiblocks&&r!
If your power generation relies on &&3Large Turbines&&r, you can pick up the &&3LuV Rotor Holder&&r.
